      • setExamStarted

        public void setExamStarted(boolean examStarted)
        This method changes state of exam boolean and starts exam timer.
        Parameters:
        examStarted - false if exam isn't started, true if exam is started

      • submitResults

        public java.lang.String submitResults(java.lang.String userCode,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> answers,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<Question> alQuestions)
        This method submits results that user made and then parameters are redirected in resultsCheck.
        Parameters:
        userCode - unique code that was generated by Linux command task and user has registered it in database
        answers - Answers list that was made by student
        alQuestions - contains information about correct answers for question
        Returns:
        resultsCheck

      • getQuestionBundle

        public java.util.ArrayList<Question> getQuestionBundle(java.lang.String userCode)
        This method generates a list of Questions to be displayed by ServerController (parsed and later HTML is made).
        Parameters:
        userCode - unique code that was generated by Linux command task and user has registered it in database
        Returns:
        pullQuestionBundle or null if user try to connect second time

      • examTimer

        public static void examTimer()
        This method sets timer for exam.

      • pullQuestionBundle

        public java.util.ArrayList<Question> pullQuestionBundle(java.lang.String currentQuestionBundle)
        Parameters:
        currentQuestionBundle - -question theme for session
        Returns:
        pullQuestionBundle

      • pullBundleNames

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> pullBundleNames()
        Returns:
        pullBundleNames

      • insertQuestion

        public boolean insertQuestion(Question question)
        Parameters:
        question - object with information about Questions.
        Returns:
        insertQuestion

      • resultsCheck

        public java.lang.String resultsCheck(java.lang.String userCode,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> answers,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<Question> alQuestions)
        This method check student result for test.
        Parameters:
        userCode - unique code that was generated by Linux command task and user has registered it in database
        answers - student answer
        alQuestions - contains information about correct answers for question
        Returns:
        student result for test session(correct and incorrect questions count)

      • studentResults

        public java.lang.String studentResults(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> correctAnswers)
        This method show incorrect answers.
        Parameters:
        correctAnswers - ArrayList with answers
        Returns:
        incorrect answers which student submitted during exam
